title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 15.6 - Pledgor's receipt for surplus
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 15.6 - Pledgor's receipt for surplus

State Regulations

The following receipt from pledgor for surplus is hereby
prescribed: Date ________
Received from--Collateral Loan Broker's Name

Address

at auction on ________. Pledgor's Name________
Address________
________
Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
